title: Ward Jump? (Best way?) - Katarina
body:
ermm Ive just started playing kat, and I'm decent as her (Haven't lost a game yet, 4/4)
But I cant really ward jump, to people set it up as some kind of hotkey, or like do they set their ward for a mouse shortcut or?
Help would be appreciated

replies.body:
Since her shunpo is E, so you buy wards and put them in the item slot 2, hence as soon as you press "2" to ward across (with mid fing) the wall then press "E"  (with index fing) without moving cursor so you blink to it.

The trinket ward is on "4", so you just have to practice sliding from "4" to "E" with index finger when jumping. If you wanna use the trinket instead.

Heres my tips if they help;

Use a comfortable keybinding for trinket/wards for instance I put wards on 3 and use c for my trinket

Don't use locked screen, it screws with the process since majority of the time you ward jump you are running and locked camera means the screen is slightly moving and wards have small hit boxes. If you are used to it when you turn it off at the furthest right side icon above the mini map hold space down when you need it centered

Last tip is you can jump to enemy ward as kat (not lee, idk about jax I don't see why not with him) this might seem dumb as you read it but alot of the time when people are running away they ward behind them so they can see you. If you are chasing them they are obviously out of e range so if you manage to e onto a ward they placed behind them it could potentially turn into a kill.
I like to use T as my ward key binding, and make sure my E is on quickcast, that usually works best for me. IMO the default 4 keybinding for wards is ridiculous.
I had trouble with this too, ages ago. Try binding the item slot with the ward in it (3) is good. and then just pressing 3 then E really fast. The hardest part is getting used to the range.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ru0AuGgk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-13T10:50:39.724+0000)
>The hardest part is getting used to the range.

This, if you don't get the range down and get consistently good at it you either don't ward hop at all or you ward hop hardly any distance at all.

Yeah I personally set wards to a mouse button on the side of my mouse. I find it allows for quicker ward jumps and I bound it to my mouse button because I got fed up of pressing the wrong number or take to long to place it. I mainly use this on Lee Sin as opposed to Kat (I am seriously terrible at her, like you don't even know how terrible I am with Katarina).

Everyone has preferences, but setting wards to a mouse button works the trick for me!
Hope this helped.

It does, but I dont have a gaming mouse, its a logitech with 3 buttons (including scroll lol)
suggest anything else?

Ward using your middle click clearly.

Though more seriously, depending on the line of your keyboard (personally for mine, my E is actually basically below my 4) it's a matter of just getting used to casting it and doing it better.
I have mine at the default 4 and I don't exactly ward jump but I ward the jungle and start hopping to them as Akali but in order for me to do that, I need to ward :P

Other than that man I don't really know. maybe binding it to a different letter that you find easier to press or something?
I'd suggest to just fiddle around for a bit, see what works and what doesn't.
